attributes.action: Keep indoor gyms open during tier 4
attributes.additional_details: Gyms are essential for peoples physical and mental health especially during winter months, keep all indoor gyms open as there is little to no proof that they cause any rise in covid cases and members follow strict guidelines.
attributes.background: Keep all indoor gyms open during tier 4

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

Keep gyms open during Tier 4 lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563904
